00081 #endif /* _WIN32 */
00082 
00083 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00084  * Constants and definitions
00085  */
00086 
00087 #define UNIXEM_PROT_READ        (0x01)          
00088 #define UNIXEM_PROT_WRITE       (0x02)          
00089 #define UNIXEM_PROT_EXEC        (0x04)          
00090 #define UNIXEM_PROT_NONE        (0x00)          
00092 #define UNIXEM_MAP_PRIVATE      (0x02)          
00093 #define UNIXEM_MAP_ANONYMOUS    (0x20)          
00094 #define UNIXEM_MAP_FIXED        (0x10)          
00096 #ifdef _WIN64
00097 # if defined(__GNUC__)
00098 #  define UNIXEM_MAP_FAILED     ((void*)(long long)~0)    
00099 # elif defined(_MSC_VER)
00100 #  define UNIXEM_MAP_FAILED     ((void*)(__int64)~0)      
00101 # else /* ? compiler */
00102 #  error Currently only GCC and VC++ compilers are recognised for Win64
00103 # endif /* compiler */
00104 #else /* ? _WIN64 */
00105 # define UNIXEM_MAP_FAILED      ((void*)~0)                
00106 #endif /* _WIN64 */
